name: HooverRobot
0:
”Alexa, ask Hoover Robot to start mission.”
”Alexa, ask Hoover Robot to stop mission.”
”Alexa, ask Hoover Robot to return to base.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: hoover robot
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Amazon Alexa and Hoover Robot make a great team when it comes to the important mission of vacuuming your home. Rogue is a great listener who takes on the mission for you. 

Give Rogue vocal commands by saying the following phrases:

"Alexa, Ask Hoover Robot to start mission"
"Alexa, Ask Hoover Robot to stop mission"
"Alexa, Ask Hoover Robot to return to base"

To get started, create a Hoover account and connect to Rogue through the Hoover Home App on your iOS device.

To use this skill, click the "Enable" button above and then sign in with your Hoover account to connect to Rogue. You can create a Hoover account in the Hoover Home App.

Supported Hoover Rogue Model: USA 970 

Please refer quick start guide and product manual under specification for configuration:
https://www.hoover.com/rogue-970-robot-vacuum/BH70970.html

For further assistance please contact us at :
https://www.hoover.com/contactus/

Stay tuned for more skills to be added.
